title: web tech
content:
hi guys how do I study webtech nothing makes sense
ISA was so bad and I referred to the pesu notes and slides and also the other dudes notes 
Are there any good YouTube channels y'all would recommend

comments.body: Try the official documentation for stuff like react , it might be usefull for you.
The documentation created by the devs
Just learn through youtube tutorials and implement it simultaneously with the tutor
Web dev simplified ...I think for the last 3 units ( in the old syllabus), he has 30 minute videos explaining the whole concept clearly
